    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AnalysisSelectionPanel
    A central hub panel for selecting the type and date range for a "what-if" food swap analysis.
    AnalysisSelectionPanel.AnalysisType
    Enum to represent the different types of analysis a user can select.
    App
    The main entry point for the Healthy Bites application.
    AverageImpactPanel
    A JPanel that displays the impact of a simulated food swap on the user's *average daily* nutrient intake.
    CFGAnalysisPanel
    A JPanel for analyzing a user's diet against Canada's Food Guide (CFG) recommendations.
    CFGFoodGroup
    CFGFoodGroup represents the number of servings in each Canada Food Guide category.
    ChartVisualizationPanel
    A simple demonstration panel that displays a JFreeChart bar chart.
    ConcreteModel
    Main model class.
    ConcreteModelProxy
    Proxy that wraps ConcreteModel object to monitor performance log.
    Controller
    The main controller class for the HealthyBites application.
    CSVAdapter
    The CSVAdapter class provides a concrete implementation of the Reader interface for reading data from a CSV file using the OpenCSV library.
    CSVLoader
    The class that helps the Model load the csv files into the database.
    CumulativeAnalysisPanel
    A JPanel that displays the cumulative nutritional impact of a simulated food swap over a specified period.
    EditPanel
    A JPanel that provides a form for editing an existing user's profile information.
    FoodItem
    FoodItem represents a class to store a food and its quantity.
    Goal
    Goal represents a class to store a user's nutritional goal.
    GoalPanel
    A JPanel for setting up a food swap goal.
    GoalPanel2
    A JPanel that displays the results of a food swap.
    HomePanel
    The main dashboard or home screen panel for a logged-in user.
    InitialLoadObserver
    Defines a contract for observer objects that need to perform an initial, complete data load from the model.
    LoginPanel
    A JPanel that provides the user login interface.
    Meal
    Meal represents a class to store a meal with type (breakfast, lunch, etc), the date it was eaten, and a list of food items included in the meal.
    MealHistoryPanel
    A JPanel that displays a scrollable history of meals.
    MealObserver
    Observer interface that updates Meal observers
    MealPanel
    A JPanel that provides a form for users to log a new meal.
    MealPanelObserver
    An observer specifically responsible for keeping the meal history displays updated.
    MealSubject
    Defines a subject that associates with Observer for Meal updates
    Model
    Defines interface for core Model class
    NutrientAnalysisPanel
    A JPanel that allows users to select a date range and view an analysis of their average nutrient intake.
    Nutrition
    This class represents nutritional information.
    PerMealAnalysisPanel
    A JPanel that provides a detailed, per-meal breakdown of the nutritional impact of a food swap.
    Reader
    Defines Adapter for Reading CSV files
    RegisterPanel
    A JPanel that provides a user registration form.
    SwapSelectionPanel
    A JPanel that displays a list of suggested food items for a swap.
    SwapVisualizationPanel
    A JPanel that allows users to select and view different visualizations of food swap analysis data.
    SwapVisualizationPanel.VisualizationContext
    Enum representing different visualization contexts.
    TableDefinitions
    Defines the format of data table
    TimeSeriesVisualizationStrategy
    A strategy implementation of SwapVisualizationStrategy that creates a time series chart.
    UserProfile
    This class represents a user's profile in the HealthyBites app.
    ViewFacade
    The ViewFacade class acts as a single point of entry for the Controller to interact with the entire view component of the application.
